meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Diana Zinser Sam Osborne Christina McTighe Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7009.

td.p: Diana Zinser, a lawyer from Berwyn, Pennsylvania
Sam Osborne, a graphic design student from Lake City, Florida
Christina McTighe, a library associate from Washington, D.C. (whose 1-day cash winnings total $21,600)

tr.td: NICE BEARD
"DOUBLE" OR NOTHING
SCIENCE FICTION
BABIES ARE BORING
JUST KIDDING
PLEASE, NO LETTERS
